parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the airbag system can lead to the illumination of the airbag warning light, which can cause driver distraction, and in some cases, may prevent the airbag from deploying properly in the event of a crash, potentially increasing the risk of injury or fatality.
symptoms: The airbag warning light illuminates
the airbag light comes on intermittently
the airbag light remains on constantly
the airbag system fails to function properly
the airbag system is triggered by seat adjustments.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty airbag connector can cause the airbag system to malfunction, leading to the illumination of the airbag warning light, and potentially preventing the airbag from deploying properly in the event of a crash, which can increase the risk of injury or fatality.
symptoms: The airbag warning light illuminates
the airbag light comes on intermittently
the airbag light remains on constantly
the airbag system fails to function properly
the airbag system is triggered by seat adjustments.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the DSG automatic transmission can cause the transmission to shift to neutral while driving, leading to a loss of power and control, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The transmission shifts to neutral while driving
the vehicle jerks or hesitates when starting off
the PRNDS lights flash
the transmission fluid leaks
the transmission punctures.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Temperature Sensing Unit and Mechatronic Unit Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the temperature sensing unit and mechatronic unit can cause the transmission to malfunction, leading to a loss of power and control, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The transmission shifts to neutral while driving
the vehicle jerks or hesitates when starting off
the PRNDS lights flash.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrical System Faults - Body Control Module (BCM)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty BCM can cause various electrical system malfunctions, leading to inconvenience, distraction, and potentially, safety risks.
symptoms: Trunk release button does not always work
driver's window sometimes does not close properly
dashboard indicates door is open with beeping
gas cap release mechanism malfunction.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent headlamp failure can reduce visibility, increasing the risk of accidents, especially at night or in low-light conditions.
symptoms: Passenger-side headlamp flickers and turns off while driving
requires turning off and on to temporarily correct the issue.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the instrument cluster can cause inaccurate or missing information, which can lead to safety issues, such as incorrect fuel level readings or malfunctioning warning lights.
symptoms: Fuel gauge fluctuations
coolant sensor malfunction
dashboard instrument cluster failure
radio turns on by itself.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the headlights can reduce visibility, increasing the risk of accidents, especially at night or in low-light conditions.
symptoms: Intermittent headlight failure
idiot light comes on
headlight turns off and then back on after a few seconds.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission shifting issues can cause the engine to rev excessively, leading to decreased fuel efficiency, increased wear on the engine and transmission, and potentially causing accidents due to loss of control.
symptoms: RPMs rev
engine revs
and it seems to whir before catching gears when shifting up
never down.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Rough idling can cause decreased fuel efficiency, increased emissions, and potentially lead to engine damage if not addressed.
symptoms: Vehicle idles roughly after starting.
